alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bay, west central Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 631 PM EDT/531 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hiland Park, or near Lynn Haven, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor Flooding due to heavy rain and Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flood impacts including roadway ponding are expected. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Springfield, Hiland Park, Nixon, Bayhead, Fountain, Singer Road, Dirego Park, Recota Beach, College Station, Saunders, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Porter Lake and Brannonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
